Different Crime.Crime Name: Violation of privacy under Personal Information and Protection of Electronic Documents Act
cause_of_action: Disclosure of gym usage data without consent
procedure_followed: Complaint to Privacy Commissioner, investigation, report, court hearing under PIPEDA s. 14(1)
decision_reasoning: Nubody's Fitness Centres disclosed Randall's personal information without explicit consent. Forms did not mention disclosure, and evidence showed no clear notice to Randall.
result_of_case: Court dismissed application; no damages awarded.
evidence_presented: Forms did not mention disclosure, and evidence showed no clear notice to Randall.
discretion_exercise: No damages awarded due to minimal harm and lack of malicious intent.
decision_conclusion: Nubody's violated PIPEDA but adequately remedied it by updating procedures.
